Investor_12_pre_2.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_2.content: As an investor, I have maintained a reputation of trustworthiness and pro-social behavior. My approach during the investment process was characterized by collaboration and open communication, fostering trust with my trustee. I demonstrated integrity by addressing discrepancies constructively and maintaining clear expectations while focusing on shared goals. This experience reinforces my strong commitment to being a reliable partner in future investments.
